channel.title: How do i do this?
channel.description:
hello, im on a delta base.
When a new account is created, items appear in the inventory, how do i change them?
thanks

item.title: How do i do this?
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

Wow i wouldnt post if i could find it would i

im posting because someone “experienced” would know exactly where it is.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i do this?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“I james I, post:3, topic:334385”]erm, dont treat my like a novice coder, ive done it a quicker way than that by searching for one of the id’s in: client.java, player.java, playerhandler.java.[/quote]And that’s exactly how you find it. It’s not that hard. Hell, get Notepad++ and it will search all of the files in a directory for a term. And yeah, that is the quickest way. Unless you’re worldly omniscient and know exactly what line of the file it’s on.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i do this?
item.dc:creator: @I_james_I I james I
item.description:
@I_james_I wrote:

erm, dont treat my like a novice coder, ive done it a quicker way than that by searching for one of the id’s in: client.java, player.java, playerhandler.java.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i do this?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

Ctrl+F’ing your way through client.java until you find the “addItem” calls that add the item IDs which show up in your inventory would be the smart (and obvious) way.

Read full topic
